TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceProvider

summary.span: 定义类必需实现来作为资源提供程序的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface a class must implement to act as a resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 资源提供程序帮助的资源文件中的值检索。A resource provider facilitates the retrieving of values from a resource file. 形式的表达式时`<%$ Resources: classKey, resourceKey %>`遇到在页面分析期间分析资源提供程序返回的资源的本地化的值。When an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: classKey, resourceKey %>` is encountered during page parsing, the resource provider returns the localized value for the resource. 类创建的实例检索值的过程中使用的对象。The class creates instances of objects for use in retrieving the values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了检索缓存的值的自定义的资源提供程序工厂。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. 资源提供程序工厂创建的实现的类实例。The resource provider factory creates an instance of a class that implements . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

abstract member GetObject : string * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> obj

span.span: The key identifying a particular resource.

param.name: culture
param.span: 标识资源本地化值的区域性。

span.span: The culture identifying a localized value for the resource.

summary.span: 返回键和区域性的资源对象。

span.span: Returns a resource object for the key and culture.
An that contains the resource value for the and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现时，方法返回基于当前区域性的资源键的本地化的值。When implemented, the method returns the localized value for a resource key based on the current culture. 实现类可以检索属性的值如果`culture`未传入参数。The implementing class could retrieve the property if a value for the `culture` parameter is not passed in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了检索缓存的值的自定义的资源提供程序工厂。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. 资源提供程序工厂创建的实现的自定义的资源提供程序实例。The resource provider factory creates an instance of a customized resource provider that implements . 资源提供程序包括自定义方法。The resource provider includes a customized method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResourceReader As IResourceReader
public: property System::Resources::IResourceReader ^ ResourceReader { System::Resources::IResourceReader ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，以便从资源文件中读取资源值。

span.span: Gets an object to read resource values from a source.

value.span: 与当前资源提供程序关联的 。

span.span: The associated with the current resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象从源读取顺序的名称/值对。An object reads sequential name/value pairs from a source. 并类提供默认分别接口实现从.resources 和.resx 文件进行读取。The and classes provide default interface implementation for reading from .resources and .resx files, respectively. 其他实现接口可能从包含资源值的任何源中读取。Other implementations of the interface could read from any source containing resource values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了检索缓存的值的自定义的资源提供程序工厂。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. 资源提供程序工厂创建的实现的自定义的资源提供程序实例。The resource provider factory creates an instance of a customized resource provider that implements . 资源提供程序包括自定义属性。The resource provider includes a customized property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]
